summary: When a college student unfriends a mysterious girl online, she finds herself fighting a demonic presence that wants to make her lonely by killing her closest friends.
cast: Alycia Debnam-Carey|William Moseley|Connor Paolo|Brit Morgan|Brooke Markham|Sean Marquette|Liesl Ahlers|Shashawnee Hall|Susan Danford|Lee Raviv|Nicholas Pauling|David Butler|Julian Katz|Kiano Janse van Rensburg|Dorothy Ann Gould|Kimberleigh Stark|Wendy Acton Burnell|Julie Summers|Nevena Jablanovic|Jay Anstey|Matthew Ballen|Carolyn Forword|Owen De Jager|Bill Russell|Deirdre Wolhuter|Leon Clingman|Roxanne Kalie|Lauren Steyn|Chloe Hirschman|Michelle Nothnagel
title: Friend Request
